District 8 Council Member Paige Ellis
-------------------------------------

![Paige Ellis](https://www.austintexas.gov/sites/default/files/images/Council/Paige%20Ellis-D8Headshot-240x240.jpg)
Council Member Paige Ellis was elected in 2018 and re-elected in 2022 to represent District 8 – Southwest Austin. Her professional background includes Marketing and Public Involvement. For 8 years prior to being elected, she worked for an environmental firm specializing in environmental compliance on housing development and regional transportation projects. She has a bachelor’s degree in Sociology from the University of Texas at San Antonio.

She is Chair of the Mobility Committee, Vice Chair of the Climate, Water, Environment and Parks Committee and also serves on the Austin Energy Oversight Committee and the CapMetro Transportation Authority Board.
[Learn more about Council Member Ellis.](https://www.austintexas.gov/department/district-8/about/biography)

First Term: Jan. 7, 2019 through Jan. 6, 2023
Second Term: Jan. 6, 2023 through Jan. 6, 2027
